Home.industriesDescription: Current Tech Industries Sdn Bhd was established in 2006 as a high-tech software enterprise focused on research, development, production, and sales of technology products. Headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, we have plans to establish branches in Penang, Sabah, and Sarawak. With strong technological expertise and research capabilities, we are developers of projects across multiple fields and recognised as a "New Technology Enterprise" in the market.
Home.industriesDescription2: Since our inception, we have adhered to the principles of talent-oriented management and integrity-based operation, attracting industry elites. We integrate advanced information and software technologies, management methods, and corporate experience from both domestic and international sources, providing comprehensive solutions to assist enterprises in enhancing management capabilities and production capacity. Our goal is to help businesses maintain competitiveness in the fierce market competition, achieving rapid and stable development.
Home.technologyDescription: Is the key to unlocking a sustainable and prosperous future. Through innovation and technological advancements. Technology has ushered in an era of intelligence, automation, and digitisation, propelling the transformation and upgrading of industries.

serviceSubTitle_Description.softwareDescription: Empower your business with customised software solutions.
serviceSubTitle_Description.softwareDescription2: Our expert team of developers will bring your ideas to life, delivering innovative and reliable software tailored to your specific needs.
serviceSubTitle_Description.websiteDescription: We develop websites, no matter big or small with a stage-by-stage approach. From pre-production planning, crafting the GUI design, to backend development; we execute them with precision.
serviceSubTitle_Description.mobileAppDescription: We convert our clients’ core idea into innovative applications for mobile, cloud or web. We ensure the apps are developed to be compatible on major platforms as well as cater to mass devices.
serviceSubTitle_Description.managementSystemDescription2: is a revolutionary human resources tool designed to optimise workflow efficiency. It drives organisational growth and unlocks employee potential through intuitive dashboards and automation, leveraging predictive analytics.
serviceSubTitle_Description.posSystemDescription: Streamline your business operations with our powerful POS system. Manage sales, inventory, and customer data seamlessly, while providing a seamless checkout experience for your customers.
serviceSubTitle_Description.support&serviceDescription: Optimise system performance with our expert support. Our team ensures timely updates and troubleshooting for seamless operations, keeping your systems at peak efficiency.

Home.innovativeDescription: Utilise our developed system to drive efficiency, sustainability, and customer experience in your business. Groundbreaking solutions change the landscape, meeting modern demands and ensuring competitiveness.

videoCombinationDescription.educationVideoDescription2: Schools are using our technology to do incredible things in the classroom and in their communities.
videoCombinationDescription.F&BVideoDescription: While enjoying delicious and enticing meal, both ordering applications and payment methods contribute to providing customers with a delightful dining experience.
videoCombinationDescription.retailVideoDescription: Whether it's customer lists, orders, inventory records, or employee attendance, all you need is one intelligent system.
videoCombinationDescription.wholesaleVideoDescription: Bulk discounts on goods, wholesale prices on merchandise, our intelligent system specialises in sourcing solutions for businesses and retailers.
videoCombinationDescription.logisticVideoDescription: Designing an efficient transportation, logistics, and supply chain system is no longer a daunting task; it's all within our grasp.
videoCombinationDescription.enterpriseVideoDescription: The characteristics of an efficient enterprise management system include enhancing communication between the company and employees, and employing methods that influence employee attitudes and work progress.

Home.homeReminderTitle: No matter what field or industry you're in
Home.homeReminderDescription: having your own intelligent system is worth it. Don't hesitate to contact us for efficient solutions tailored just for you.

Advantage.advantageVideoDescription: Having a powerful personal system to accomplish your goals is like technology walking hand in hand with you.
Advantage.advantageSelfTitle: The advantage of our technology for Self-Employed
Advantage.advantageSelfDescription: For self-employed individuals like you, regardless of the industry you're in, we firmly believe that your relationship with technology is indispensable. We specialise in tailoring high-quality systems specifically for you, ensuring that your business reaches new heights and making managing your relationships with customers easier and more intimate.

advantageListDescription.websiteDescription: From domain registration to web design, we have service personnel who will communicate with you in detail throughout the production process to ensure that the final product fully meets your conceptual requirements.
advantageListDescription.managementDescription: Whether your independent business is large or small, you still need a comprehensive management system. That's why we approach this task with rigour to ensure that your business management is free from any obstacles.
advantageListDescription.paymentDescription: This is undoubtedly the most crucial service that businesses are
advantageListDescription.paymentDescription2: concerned about, and we excel in handling it flawlessly. Self-employed individuals can choose to use existing payment channels or apply to integrate new payment solutions with us.
advantageListDescription.supportDescription: This is also one of the most important aspects we prioritise. We
advantageListDescription.supportDescription2: provide the most comprehensive 24/5 service to ensure smooth operation of your system, even if you need to add any new features or additional services.

Advantage.advantageSelfReminderDescription: Request a quote now for developing your personal independent system.
Advantage.advantageSelfReminderDescription2: Your can also schedule consultations with our service staff to discuss any development ideas. We do not charge any consultation fees for this service.
Advantage.enterpriseVideoDescription: Powerful enterprises and robust management systems are absolutely inseparable, as they possess the capability to manage vast amounts of data effectively.
Advantage.advantageEnterpriseTitle: The advantage of our technology for Enterprise
Advantage.advantageEnterpriseDescription: Excellent enterprise management encompasses human resources, administration, finance, as well as employee work progress reports, attendance, and various employee incentive systems. That's why our technology team has developed a meticulous and carefully designed management system tailored for all types of businesses.

advantageEnterpriseListDescription.frontendDescription: A sophisticated management system's front-end and back-end reflect the professional image of the enterprise. To achieve even more positive results, we have dedicated technical personnel engaging in in-depth discussions with the enterprise management to customise development and provide explanations.
advantageEnterpriseListDescription.attendanceDescription: We have meticulously developed an effortless attendance tracking system, providing a smooth and convenient solution for time management. Furthermore, we have incorporated a reward mechanism into the employee attendance system, encouraging employees to demonstrate outstanding time management skills.
advantageEnterpriseListDescription.projectDescription: Precise data visualisation enables real-time monitoring of project task metrics, sales performance, and goal achievements, serving as a driving force. Insights into team efficiency, challenges, and employee responsibilities and contributions empower agile adjustments, propelling sustainable company growth.
advantageEnterpriseListDescription.rewardDescription: We firmly believe that employees can enjoy unique company benefits by igniting and unleashing engagement, earning points, and unlocking badges. Additionally, our technology development team has also integrated features for personalised contests and surprise activities. Enhance employee work experience through rich functionalities!
advantageEnterpriseListDescription.supportDescription: This is also one of the most important aspects we prioritise. In
advantageEnterpriseListDescription.supportDescription2: addition to offering online 24/5 service support, we also provide one-on-one tutorials for our products. This ensures smooth operation of your system throughout its usage, even if you need to add any new features or additional services.

Advantage.advantageEnterpriseReminderDescription: Request a quote now for developing your Enterprise system.
Advantage.advantageEnterpriseReminderDescription2: Your company can also schedule consultations with our service staff to discuss any development ideas. We do not charge any consultation fees for this service.

Products.productVideoDescription: Development must go through drafting frameworks, understanding details, detailed communication, careful planning, rigorous testing before it can become a finished product.
Products.productTechnologyTitle: High-quality products developed through cutting-edge technology
Products.productTechnologyDescription2: we have meticulously developed software in
Products.productTechnologyDescription3: these fields, and our collaboration with businesses in these sectors is indispensable.That's why we translate the most outstanding ideas from our technical engineers into the most innovative creations and find more effective solutions for our customers.
Products.mobileProductTechnologyDescription3: software in these fields, and our collaboration with businesses in these sectors is indispensable.That's why we translate the most outstanding ideas from our technical engineers into the most innovative creations and find more effective solutions for our customers.

education.educationDescription: A child's learning journey begins in the classroom, using tools that are flexible, user-friendly, prioritise privacy, accessibility, and sustainability. That's why we have developed this product for education, enabling parents, teachers, and school owners to better understand their child's growth in kindergarten. Additionally, we are in the process of developing a series of educational software for primary schools, secondary schools, universities, and tuition centres in the future.

attendance.attendanceDescription: In the current corporate landscape, businesses are confronted with challenges such as inconsistent employee efficiency, talent attrition, and cost management. Therefore, we have meticulously developed reward mechanisms and recognition programs to assist companies in addressing these challenges effectively. The Motion Capture “MOCAP” not only significantly boosts employee productivity but also enhances morale and output quality. Moreover, we firmly believe that recognising and rewarding employees fosters a positive organisational culture, where employees feel supported and appreciated in their roles, thus aiding in mitigating talent turnover.

financial.financialDescription: Our IT technical team specialises in developing intelligent back-office solutions for MetaQuote (MT4 / MT5) and cTrader white label and main label operators. We excel in customising web design, client frontend, agent interface, admin backend, and commission rebate systems according to the requirements of white label providers and main label operators. Our Smart Dash are designed to perfectly display the data clients want to see, and we prioritise providing the most robust security for client funds and personal information.

management.managementDescription: We fully understand that as a highly skilled and renowned trader, managing numerous investors and substantial funds requires not only delivering substantial and objective investment returns but also maintaining strict risk management in investments. Therefore, traders inevitably require a sophisticated and intelligent financial trading fund management system. Our proficient IT team is fully capable of undertaking the development of such a system. We have not only added personalised design to the dashboard but also incorporated simple and easy-to-operate modes, ensuring that investors and traders need not worry about encountering operational difficulties due to lack of understanding.

labelSolutions.labelSolutionsDescription: Not only do we seamlessly integrate the trading platform interface with our intelligent backend, but we also offer Metaquote (MT5) and cTrader white label and main label solutions. The advantage of our one-stop service ensures that you are relieved of many unnecessary hassles and allows you to accelerate the launch of operations, avoiding missing the absolute best timing for operations.

metaEditor.metaEditorDescription: This is undoubtedly great news for traders, as the widespread use of AI is becoming an inevitable trend. Many investment firms and top traders have begun to adopt AI automated trading systems, and we specialise in the development of such intelligent trading systems. We can fully transform the mindset and strategies of top traders into AI trading systems and apply them to trading on MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, and cTrader trading platforms.

cryptoWallet.cryptoWalletDescription: Many multinational operating companies conduct business through websites, and even investment firms are not limited to operating solely within their own countries. Therefore, it is essential to have a comprehensive and highly secure payment system. The TTPAY payment system not only addresses the challenges of cross-border payments but also significantly enhances the security advantages for merchants. Moreover, the application for a TTPAY payment system account is free.

Career.careerVideoDescription: We're not just creating products. We're crafting solutions to problems for the people who use them. That's our forte!
Career.careerOpportunitiesTitle: Join Our Team for Exciting Career Opportunities
Career.careerOpportunitiesDescription: Empower your future with Current Tech Industries. Join our visionary team, embrace diversity, and work on impactful projects. Explore career opportunities that fuel your growth and make a difference.

ItProgrammer.ItProgrammerDescription: We welcome IT programmers to join our team. They should be proficient in programming, testing, and maintaining code for software applications, capable of solving complex programming problems, collaborating with teams, and staying updated with technology trends for efficient development and secure solutions.

UiDesigner.UiDesignerDescription: UI/UX & Graphic designer focuses on creating user-friendly interfaces, conducting research, wireframing, prototyping, and collaborating with stakeholders. They aim to enhance user satisfaction, engagement, and accessibility through visually appealing designs and seamless experiences.

Internship.InternshipDescription: We offer internship opportunities to students or recent graduates to participate in programming, UI/UX, and graphic design within our company, providing them with practical experience in specific fields. Interns contribute to the company's projects and activities while gaining valuable skills and exploring potential career paths.

Career.careerReminderDescription: Join us on an exciting journey towards endless possibilities and growth. Embrace diverse career opportunities, unleash your potential, and become part of a supportive community that values lifelong learning and personal fulfillment. Let's build a brighter future together.
